page.title: 17STANSTED AIRPORT
page.content: It has just been decided this month, June 1985, that Stansted is to be the third London airport. Stansted is a large village to the North of Stortford with a small airport which is going to be made much bigger. This will mean a lot more work for people living in the town, and lots more houses will be needed for all the extra people to live in. We also think it will be very noisy with lots more aeroplanes flying over our town. Some people think the airport will be a good thing, but others think it will spoil the area. There will be a plane taking off every half hour and the noise level will increase by 70%.The development of Stansted has beeen one of the leading articles in the paper.
